com.paperboyclone

Class HighScoreHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paperboyclone.HighScoreHandler

  • public class HighScoreHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    HighScoreHandler is the Singleton that handles the HighScores, reading them from the filesystem, writing them to the filesystem, sorting them and printing them.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Timo Kramer

    • Method Summary
